commentBody: Sorry Jets fans, but it’s my fault. Last week, I predicted that the Jets would miss the playoffs at 10-6. The part where the Steelers would win against the lowly Browns was easy. No, it was the part where the Jets would lose to the Bills. I was certain of this. However, it is the prediction that I made in August, which is really to blame for the Jets departure. It was then that I said: “Rex Ryan will lead the Bills to an 8-8 record this year and take them downhill from there.” Next time, I’ll be more careful.
